title: Simulation Data Processing Toolkit
summary: Python utilities for preparing simulation datasets, feature extraction, normalization, and dataset versioning.

title: Model Explainability Dashboard
summary: Interactive dashboard aggregating SHAP, sensitivity, and gradient-based interpretability metrics.

title: Cloud-Native Batch Orchestration Templates
summary: Reusable IaC templates for orchestrating simulation and ML batch workloads on AKS.

title: Time-Series Feature Engineering Library
summary: Internal library for automated lag creation, decomposition, transforms, and anomaly prefilters.

title: EHR Data Normalization Pipeline
summary: Rules-based and statistical normalization pipeline for heterogeneous medical datasets.

title: Parameter Sweep Experiment Scripts
summary: Shell/Python experiment toolkit for large-scale parameter sweeps in simulation workflows.

title: Learning Analytics Prototype for Simulation Tasks
summary: Prototype that collects student behavior patterns during simulation-based tasks.

title: Microservice Observability Pack
summary: Logging, tracing, and health-check utilities for ML microservices.
